lead_paragraph: BARNWELL--John, on January 21, 2016. Beloved son of the late Thomas and Marie. Loving brother of Marie (Anthony), Patricia (the late Walter), Peter (Cathy), Robert (Colleen), William (Lori), James (Rose) and Michael and the late Thomas, Ann, Timothy and Stephen. Cherished uncle to many nieces, nephews, grand-nieces and grand-nephews. Reposing at the Kennedy-Roth Funeral Home 41-45 58th St., Woodside, NY 11377, Monday and Tuesday 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday, 10am at Corpus Christi Church, Woodside, NY. Interment Calvary Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations to www.ahrcnycfoundation.org. 1/3
